descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...2 or 3 clusters of colored boxes one of which is fully colored 21x20
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...will be the same as the input
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...color in the clusters to make them similar, although maybe rotated to the fully formed object

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...there are 1 unique object and 2 incomplete objects
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...will be same as the input to make the output you have to fill the color as same as the 1 unique object to the 2 incomplete objects
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...color the grid as per the shape of unique shape

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see... 3x3 grid and many colored grid.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size... as same as the input grid.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to... see the small 3x3 grid and do a same grid colors for the another two grids.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see... 3x3 grid and many colored grid.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size... as same as the input grid.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to... see the small 3x3 grid and do a same grid colors for the another two grids.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a 3x3 grid consisting of three colors (excluding the background color) and at least one other cluster of squares that have two of the colors of the 3x3 grid.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...is the same as the input grid size
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...leave the background the same color and use the 3x3 grid as a reference to fill in the third color between the other cluster to complete the pattern seen in the 3x3 grid.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see... one small shape made up of three colors, as well as several other smaller square shapes, either single blocks or 2x2 blocks.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size... is the same as the input grid
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to... copy the input grid. Find the object made of 3 colors and use this as your key - do not make any changes to this shape, but realize that this is your example shape. You then have to recreate that shape using the other single blocks as your starting point. Fill in the missing color to connect blocks so that they make the same shape as the example shape. The result might be flipped or rotated. If you see any 2x2 squares then you should still create the example shape but make it twice as big.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...same as main object
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...surrounding all yellow
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...filled black all blue

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...clusters of different colored shapes
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...the same as the input grid.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...you will create the clusters like the completed cluster.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...One small shape made up of three colors, as well as several other smaller square shapes, either single blocks or 2by2
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...The same as the input grid
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...copy the input grid find the object made of 3 colors and use this as do not make any changes to this shape

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see... 2 or 3 clusters of colored boxes,one which is a "fully colored"3x3 box
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...will be the same as the input
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to..."color in" the clusters to make them similar,although maybe rotated to the fully formed object

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see... 2 or 3 clusters of colored boxes, one of which is a "fully colored"  3x3 box
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...will be the same as the input
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to..."color in" the clusters to make them similar, although maybe rotated to the fully formed object. These clusters may be of different sizes, but they will be dimensionally similar, even if rotated.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a a unique background color which is usually the more than other colors, focus on the other clusters of colors
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...will be the same size as the input size
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...form the unique pattern of the design made with other colors that are different from the background color at the top left angle of the input grid. You have to form a similar color pattern in different size. You then rotate the two unique colors at the edge of the design like you are flipping it to the other side.
